name: Finally Free
description:
Play as Jonny, the most stereotypical, flat and generic protagonist you can encounter in a video game. Explore the nightmare that he didn't choose to live through and seal his fate with your decisions.

Summary

  • 30~ minutes long
  • Play with mouse only
  • Good & Bad ending
  • Horror & Terror included
  • A mix of retro & new
  • Dark humor
  • Comes without a save game
  • Explosions

"Life ain't fair, get used to it" - Nobody
